name: Space Ship:Army Fighting Alien
description:
Space Ship: Army Fighting Alien is alien games shooting in the space ship, you must protect the ship from alien super girl invasion. Crush them all before they failed our misiion for looking new earth for human race. The survival of human race is in your hands. Shoot to outlive! Develop into the soldier of area battlefield and face the alien menace! Do your greatest to cease and revert the invasion.
Features:
- Great 3D art design.
- Search and hunt the aliens.
- Destroy the alien nests.
- Weapons switching with one tap only
- deppense ship from alien
- Enemy with intelligent AI ?
- Realistic 3D alien isolation game
- Multiple battle maps.
